resources.string: Secas is an app that is targeted at helping bring Security Awareness, that allows users to book for Security Services from Security Agencies from within thier location. The App will allow for easy access to security services and help bring awareness to the general public on how to get Private security services at very minimal rates. Secas is an app that will thrive, given the increasing rate of crime and social vices, security services will be easily accessible from the app based on location.

Hello I am Sikhi Your Customer Care Assistant "
" Press 1 for Help "
"Press 2 to View Agencies "
" Press 3 to Subscribe "
" Press 4 to Return to Home Menu
